summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from November 2019 discussing a news report that Prince Andrew met with Ghislaine Maxwell in London in June 2019. The email shows FBI officials coordinating to ensure proactive efforts to locate Maxwell ahead of potential arrest, and includes a forwarded message from U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman sharing the news article.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.role: U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Forwards a news report about Prince Andrew meeting Ghislaine Maxwell to FBI contacts, noting he has no idea if the report is accurate but that it states Maxwell was in London in June.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Subject of a forwarded news report alleging he met with Ghislaine Maxwell in London in June 2019.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the FBI's proactive hunt; the news report alleges she was in London in June 2019 and met with Prince Andrew.

connections.description: A forwarded news report alleges they met in London in June 2019.
Berman, as U.S. Attorney, is involved in the case concerning Maxwell and forwards intelligence about her location to the FBI.

events.title: Alleged meeting between Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A news report alleges that Prince Andrew met with Ghislaine Maxwell in London.

events.title: FBI internal coordination on Maxwell hunt
events.description: FBI officials email to ensure proactive and thorough efforts to locate Ghislaine Maxwell ahead of obtaining probable cause for arrest.

keyFacts: In November 2019, the FBI was actively coordinating to ensure a 'proactive and thorough' hunt for Ghislaine Maxwell to have her 'in pocket' before obtaining probable cause for arrest.

U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman forwarded a news article to the FBI alleging that Prince Andrew met with Ghislaine Maxwell in London in June 2019, though he noted he had 'no idea if this report is accurate.'
The document indicates the FBI's operational planning in late 2019 to locate and apprehend Ghislaine Maxwell, who was still at large at the time.
